name: Love Rolling Cats
description:
Free game of joining the rolling balls.
Draw a line that allows you to unite the two adorable love kittens
Once the line is drawn, the cats act like a ball and turn following the physical laws.
It contains realistic physics. Use the obstacles and rockets to help the balls together.
Many levels in preparation.
Have fun while thinking and exercising the brain.
The two cats will be very happy.
